1.5.0.name: wordpress/digital-art-image-gallery
1.5.0.description:
This image gallery presents different computer generated digital art images and animations in its nice-looking and configurable sidebar widget.

This plugin requires active connection to the internet to be able to load media files that are used to enhance user experience and to provide access to a growing database of free images and photos licenced under Creative Commons.

Please find further information at the official project website ...
